name: Impundulu (Lightning Bird)
shortLoreBlurb: Impundulu (Lightning Bird) is a creature from Zulu/Xhosa associated with lightning, vampiric. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
description: Impundulu (Lightning Bird) is a creature from Zulu/Xhosa associated with lightning, vampiric. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings.
